channel.title: ultra on Nandixer
channel.description: Recent content in ultra on Nandixer

item.title: Ultra Tyndarius Guide
item.description: Introduction Tyndarius, the Avatar of Fire at /join ultratyndarius is a good entry-level Ultra and the first one I’d recommend clearing after the three in TimeInn. His Insignias offer Infernal Flame Pyromancer, an armor with a 25% boost to all rewards and 35% to damage. Infernal Flame Khopesh, also from Tyndarius, offerst the best damage boost to Elementals. Clearing Tyndarius also unlocks further endgame content. Worth mentioning that Tyndarius is a daily Ultra, not a weekly one.

item.title: Ultra Malgor Guide
item.description: Introduction Malgor, The First Speaker at /join ultraspeaker is currently the most complicated, but also most rewarding Ultra to beat. His Insignias offer Radiant Goddess of War, the best-in-slot boost armor for all situations. Most players tend to get Dauntless first though, because of how overpowered that enhancement is on some classes. Spoiler: Main Story, Malgor Questline Malgor is called a Speaker, because he speaks. A Speaker is a more evolved form of a Mumbler, one of these:
